titleStmt.title: Advice to young persons, relating both to faith & practice contain'd in some plain directions how to demean themselves : together with some few motives to the observation of what is here recommended.
titleStmt.author: Shaw, Samuel, 1635-1696.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Samuel Shaw by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library (London, England)
